name: Pokémon™ Bank
description:
In the latter half of March, 2023, it is planned to terminate the sale of service tickets and to make the service free of charge. For details, please refer to the official Pokémon website.

Pokémon Bank is an application that allows you to connect your Nintendo 3DS family system to your own Internet-based Boxes and store your precious Pokémon there to be withdrawn later. Bring the Pokémon you've been raising with such care with you on your next great adventure! Pokémon Bank is a paid service, with an annual charge for usage.
 
Pokémon Bank is compatible with the following games:
 
Pokémon X
Pokémon Y
Pokémon Omega Ruby
Pokémon Alpha Sapphire
Pokémon Red Version
Pokémon Blue Version
Pokémon Yellow Version : Special Pikachu Edition
Pokémon Sun
Pokémon Moon
Pokémon Ultra Sun
Pokémon Ultra Moon
 
In Pokémon Bank, you'll have 100 Boxes that can hold 30 Pokémon each, allowing you to store a total of 3,000 Pokémon! Pokémon Bank is a powerful resource for players who like to obtain many different kinds of Pokémon, or for those who like to raise many Pokémon in preparation for battles and competitions. If the worst were to somehow happen and you lost your Game Card, your Pokémon would still be safe and ready to be withdrawn to a new game if they were deposited to Pokémon Bank!
 
Using Pokémon Bank, you'll be able to transfer Pokémon you've caught in the Nintendo 3DS Virtual Console versions of Pokémon Red Version, Pokémon Blue Version, and Pokémon Yellow Version: Special Pikachu Edition into your copy of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon. Pokémon from Pokémon Omega Ruby, Pokémon Alpha Sapphire, Pokémon X, and Pokémon Y can also be brought into Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon in the same way.
 
When you download Pokémon Bank, you can also download the free linked application Poké Transporter! When you insert a Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, and Pokémon White Version 2  Game Card into your Nintendo 3DS family system, you'll be able to use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon from these games into their own online Boxes. Then, you can easily transfer those Pokémon into compatible Pokémon titles using Pokémon Bank!
 
You may find yourself unable to use Pokémon Bank or Poké Transporter to deposit any Pokémon created illegally by software unauthorised by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo into your online Boxes, or to move these Pokémon between online Boxes.
disclaimer:
This software requires a broadband internet connection during use.

The registration of Nintendo Network ID and acceptance of the network-related terms and privacy policies are required.
